website_summaries.verdict: Captures attention with bright colors and soft rubber spikes that fascinate toddlers and help older kids focus.
pros: Nice, bright colors and great feel
Attracts toddlers and young kids very well
Hold up well to constant use and squeezing
cons: Too big to fit some users’ hands comfortably as a fidget tool
Some kids don’t like the spiky feel of the ball
May be too distracting to use in classrooms, as they can roll away

customer_reviews.title: My English Bulldog Loves These...
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for my English Bulldog. She loves small balls that have a texture to them. She loves cat toys. These are non-toxic and sturdy enough to hold up to her biting down on them. When they bounce the direction is unpredictable because of the little spikes on the ball and she just loves when they go every which way. I'm sorry I can't give a review as to how a child or adult might like these as a "stress ball" but my Bulldog loves them.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBoss ReviewsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for dogs, too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my toy poodle and he is in love! So far he hasn't ripped any up which he normally does within 5 minutes. They are very bouncy. I only wish they sold these in a 5 pack of yellow since that is the easiest color for dogs to find in the grass. We'll save the yellow one for outdoors only. It is so hard finding balls like this without the squeaker inside. I used to buy gorilla balls, but they changed their materials or something so now he chews them up- plus they are expensive. Anyhow- love these sensory balls and so does little Pepper
customer_reviews.author: Musicteach71

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids with ADD
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for child with ADD....As long as you insist this is not a toy and it is for help in class. It is not distracting to other kids in class as it doesn’t make noise .
customer_reviews.author: treevnp

customer_reviews.title: The material attracts everything to them!! Dust, crumbs etc.
customer_reviews.text: These would be really great if it wasn’t for the fact that they attract every little particle of dust, crumbs, whatever it is you have on the floor it’ll attach to these things. Not ideal for kids! I’m using them during bath time cause they would get filthy after just touching the floor once.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele

customer_reviews.title: So far they really liked holding them
customer_reviews.text: My students tried them for the first time today. So far they really liked holding them. It provides a different sensory input that some of the kids liked more than the other objects I have for them to hold while listening. I myself like the feeling of them. They relax me. They may not be for everyone though. Some students didn't like the spiky feeling and preferred a smooth stress ball instead.
customer_reviews.author: A. Earl

customer_reviews.title: I bought some for my group at work.
customer_reviews.text: My colleagues at work and I spend a lot of time working on computers. These sensory balls are really good at helping to massage the hands and wrists to reduce stress and strain points. We are very aware of repetitive stress issues from keyboarding. I bought several of these to give out to my group and we all use them throughout the day. Inexpensive and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Blauw

customer_reviews.title: Not a stress ball
customer_reviews.text: These balls are okay, but not what I was expecting. The plastic is very hard, and not easy to squeeze. I was expecting a soft, squeezable stress-ball that would "bubble" out when squeezed. They may be good for hand exercise and circulation stimulation, but they are not stress-relievers.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Spiky and soft sensory ball.
customer_reviews.text: These little balls are a fun sensory toy for kids. They are easy to grip and have a good texture. Despite the little spikes, they are soft and don't hurt even when hit the the face. As an adult, I have also found myself playing with these or rolling them under my feet. Five stars for the balls, but taking one star off for value since $2 per ball seems a bit pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: My special needs kids like them
customer_reviews.text: I work with special needs kids on my school bus. It really helps them stay calmer with noisy sensory overload of the bus. If I could ask one thing to make them better is to make them a little softer. They are spiky and just hard enough that when thrown they can hurt. Not a lot but enough to be a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these balls with the intention to bring them to child yoga class I teach. The packaging was perfect and I received them so quickly. The balls are much more "bouncy" than I had imagined and that's a added feature in my opinion. I will definitely recommend and purchase Impresa Products again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Lovely for babies, also backrubs lol
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves these! I hope they are as non-toxic as they say they are-they are made in china. There was no smell and I cleaned them with tea tree lavender spray :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too large to close a fist around, but small enough for pocket or purse
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a fidget distraction and sensory perception during panic attacks. It helps to keep them from coming on when I can roll them between my hands. They are not the soft, squishy stress balls. These are hard rubber with a bit of give in the spikes so you don't hurt your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Girl George

customer_reviews.title: Liked the multiple colors and the balls have lasted through ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased for a child with anxiety, working well. Liked the multiple colors and the balls have lasted through some very intense work outs in my childs hands. would purchase again, will likely purchase pack for the OT's my childs' school.
customer_reviews.author: badjenetix

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and Fun Sensory Balls
customer_reviews.text: The balls are spiky and bumpy and offer a wonderful sensory experience. They are just right for small hands and they are BPA free.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Robinson

customer_reviews.title: A fun little toy, even my mini poodle loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a small class with children ranging from 7 to 8 years old. They tend to roll all over the place (even when the children are trying to be careful), so they don't seem to be good idea for a classroom setting. They can be distracting but not as obnoxious as fidget spinners. I gave them 5 stars because the children loved them, but I ended up giving them to my 2 year old mini poodle who loves them and has not broken one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Make A Good Day

customer_reviews.title: Really durable.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a very particular dog. The spikey pet balls she loves have been completely out of stock for ages. Although these are slightly bigger she loves them just as much and they are even more durable! Very happy with this product!👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Me and my baby really like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great balls for massage and games. They are rubber, not tough. My 6 month old baby loves to bite them.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: So hard to find toxic free toys!
customer_reviews.text: Love these balls!! Love that it’s pvc and toxin free. We have has these balls since my toddler was an infant and he still adores these balls. Easy to clean and I feel good knowing they are toxic free
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great for increasing hand strength and mobility
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis and extremely limited mobility in my hands and I bought these to help strengthen my hands. I’ve tried a couple other kinds before but my hands were so weak I couldn’t use them. These are great and the spikes help massage and increase the circulation also. The thickness makes them appear very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Easthon

customer_reviews.title: Great sensory toy for baby 6MO
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 6month old son for sensory play. They fit perfectly in his hand, & while they are soft, they require strength to squeeze, improving muscle strength as well. The colors are bright & easy to track with the eyes. I love that they are dishwasher safe & allow me to ensure my child's toys are clean!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for little hands and aren’t as staticky and prime to collecting hair and lint as others. The colors are bright and my 2 year old LOVES them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Glorified dog toys
customer_reviews.text: These balls feel like glorified dog toys. Plus, all the balls and the same spikes - I didn't read close enough to see that they weren't all different textures. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: asaucey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece. She loved it. They turned into ammunition between my nieces, my father, my sister and myself at Christmas. My mother was not pleased with us.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balls
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a heavy chewer. He chews through these kind of balls within a week or so, but not this brand. He got his first one in the fall, and it is still whole :0) These balls bounce really nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these balls!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my 9 year old cockapoo. He loves the way they feel on his gums when he chews on them, and they make for a fun game of fetch!
customer_reviews.author: TLRCLR

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that it's BPA free
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son's teacher needed. I love the fact that it's BPA free... colors are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Meirav Keret

customer_reviews.title: Great fidget balls:)
customer_reviews.text: These are great, nice and sturdy, and they squeeze well. Colors are beautiful. I’m an EMDR trauma therapist and use these with my clients. They can fidget with them when anxious or highly emotional.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sanford

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME baby toys!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old is obsessed with these. He tries to carry all of them at once which is adorable and entertaining in itself. He loves them so much, such a simple toy that has provided hours of play so far. Thanks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Sensory toys
customer_reviews.text: Love these and so does my daughter but they’re a little sticky and get dirty very easily! If you don’t mind cleaning before each use not a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Emmillia Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Cute balls. Great packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Colorful and cute balls. My nephew is going to love them. An added bonus: The packaging is very nice! When you're giving a gift it's always nice when the box you're giving looks as impressive as this does.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D. Straut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pups!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little balls! Bought them for our dogs and they love ‘em! The spikes help message their gums. Perfect size as they are just a tad smaller than a tennis ball.
customer_reviews.author: Angela PV

customer_reviews.title: ASD kid approves
customer_reviews.text: We just got these and my kid loves them! He likes the texture of the spikes and he likes watching them bounce when you throw them. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Loved and missing
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves them so much until some of them are missing. I got 2 left. He loves throwing them and watching them bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Oshun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog and they are perfect for him. No squeak but that is great cause he isn't trying to get the squeaker out which he does with some toys. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Alison A Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money- my dog tore these up in 30 min
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fun, quality sensory toys!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love these, especially as fidget toys when we're reading aloud.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Hern

customer_reviews.title: Great for Your Child's Sensory Kit!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son absolutely loves these! I bought them to put in his sensory kit and they completely help him turn his focus away from the thoughts and struggles in his mind to something simple like "I wonder if I can juggle these?!"
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect that it is dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for our local hospital for the children there. Perfect that it is dishwasher safe. Arrived on time during this busy season
customer_reviews.author: Graceanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors so I can find them, my pup has a blast with these!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Barrett

customer_reviews.title: No hole means no mold!
customer_reviews.text: Hooray for balls without the little holes that trap spit!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy. the texture is great for kids to grab. 100% satisfy
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Great texture, bounce well, perfect for an childs or adult hand.
customer_reviews.text: Have had several types. Didn’t care there was no flashing light, balls (5) are hard enough to bounce well but are pliable. Fun just to carry around. Therapeutic as I see it.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID BRIDGEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Cute product but collects everything
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea and the product is sturdy. Pretty colors too! Downside is they collect everything. We have a dog so unfortunately they collect all the hair and she also thinks it’s one of her toys.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vallely

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Focus Tool
customer_reviews.text: I am a special education teacher and my students use a lot of fidgets. There are sturdy, bright colors and nice size for young grips. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: cmm

customer_reviews.title: Baby and neurologist loves it
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves it. My sister (pediatric neurologist) says it effectively stimulates my niece’s senses. One tip: wash it before passing it to your baby.
customer_reviews.author: CSalvo

customer_reviews.title: Like this product
customer_reviews.text: I have just begun using these spiky balls in my counseling. My high school students have used them to help stay on task. I am curious to see how my elementary students do, but if it's anything like my high school, it should go over well. :) Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kari R. Torkelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. Very durable, and nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are great, but for some reason I thought they’d be different sizes or textures. They are all identical, except for the color. I probably wouldn’t have bought them if I had know.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, But a Bit TOO Pointy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, thinking they might help him to focus better on his school work at home. Unfortunately, he says that they are TOO pointy! They seem to be well made, though, and the colors are nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Christina

customer_reviews.title: The cost and quality are very good.
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for a birthday present for our one year old granddaughter. She loves to play with the Spiky Balls and loves the colors. The different texture of the balls helps her in her development also. She loves picking them up and tossing them
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for babies
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 1 yr old for Christmas. He loves them. My only complaint is that they taste pretty nasty when you first get them. I put mine in the dishwasher before I gave them to him and they are much better.
customer_reviews.author: burquechick

customer_reviews.title: Missing one ball
customer_reviews.text: Missing one ball, otherwise happy with product. Small enough for a middle school child to use. Fits nice in palm of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: We love them
customer_reviews.text: These are quality toys for any age. My son usually gets tired of new toys quickly but he comes back to these every morning. We had some guests over and even the adults couldn't stop playing with them. I will probably buy another pack in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor
customer_reviews.text: Gave out as party favors. Baby loves too, so it was a win all around.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for psychiatric venues and schools.
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are latex free. Perfect for our sensory room.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Get Them!!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter LOVES these, best money I've spent in a while.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers love these balls and they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Simple but awesome baby toy
customer_reviews.text: Bouncy, great size and texture! My 9 month old loves them! They are easy to grab, and the texture is very stimulating. Added bonus, they bounce!
customer_reviews.author: Allison L.

customer_reviews.title: Shape and texture are great..
customer_reviews.text: They were a little smaller than i expected, but the overall buying and shipping experience was good!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome p;oduct
customer_reviews.text: My autistic grandson can't let go of these. They are so calming. He carries them in his backpack and sometimes shares them with his friends who have anxiety. The best! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensory Therapeutic Balls
customer_reviews.text: These sensory balls have helped my clients with neopathy and nerve sensory symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Duval

customer_reviews.title: My students love them!  Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: These are great to use in a special education room. I have high school students that use them and they love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ADHD and Autistic kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these when he is stressed and anxious. Great way to let him work on his focus while still keeping his hands busy.
customer_reviews.author: Juls

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Good size, texture, and color. And for being silicone, they surprisingly don’t pick up every little piece of dirt or dog hair... which is a big win.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Puzey

customer_reviews.title: Quality sensory balls.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. No chemical smells. Durable for sensory play. Bought a second set as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our 9 month old
customer_reviews.text: These are great for our 9 month old. They are easy for babies to pick up, and they are the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it, originally bought it for my autistic son ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, originally bought it for my autistic son for his therapy/sensory bin, but my 2y/o found it first lol and hid them from his big brother in the air vent. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described but better. Material is not rigid or too hard to manipulate. Love the colors too
customer_reviews.author: Pgolfing

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like these but they’re smaller than I expected but good sensory for my son

customer_reviews.title: product looks great, balls too big to fit in my small ...
customer_reviews.text: product looks great, balls too big to fit in my small hands, not usable by me as a fidget toy.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My children love these balls. Arrived on time exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Partial review
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for Christmas stocking so technically they haven’t been kid tested. I couldn’t review durability and sturdiness at this time but will update when she has had them for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: These are BPA/Phthalates/Latex free :-)
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for sensory stimulation for my 7 month old! Colors are bright and bold. I really appreciate that these are safe for my baby to play with and are BPA/Phthalates/Latex free :-) Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: robynjennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sensory
customer_reviews.text: My students love these sensory balls. They get them out of the box they are kept in as soon as they walk in the door.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The colors and that there were 5 of them. My dog Barney conviscated 2 for his toys, he loves balls.

customer_reviews.title: Low wuality
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. Low on air, so not really firm enough for play

customer_reviews.title: Stress relief
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, but the balls seem to "shed", which is not ideal. Overall, worth the purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to quiet some kids in the classroom. I don't mind squeezing one myself, occasionally.

customer_reviews.text: Will be used by my autistic grandchildren. They were excited to play with them and the other sensory items I had purchased.

customer_reviews.text: I have terrible anxiety and these were useful for self soothing and calming myself by rolling them between my hands. Very durable. About the size of a baseball.

customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Theres not a strong plastic odor which is a big plus. I was very happy with my purchase and will purchase from company again.

customer_reviews.text: Early delivery. Amazing quality. Fantastic service and products. Will buy again in the future for sure!

customer_reviews.text: These are super sturdy and firm yet soft and squishy. The flexible spikes are perfect for my sensory seeking 8 year old. I would say they squish down to about half the size of the full size when you squeeze as hard as you can. Love the colors!

customer_reviews.title: They seem pretty interesting to my 5month old
customer_reviews.text: They seem pretty interesting to my 5month old. The spikes I worry though that she may hurt her lil gums with when placing them in her mouth. But so far other than that. Its good.
customer_reviews.author: Jetaime Montes

customer_reviews.title: Sensory input for classroom focus
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a sensory tool to help students focus in my second grade classroom. The texture is great, they come in different colors and the BEST part is how durable they are. They are a great tool that OT approves of, and the kids also find helpful. Sometimes even general ed students need sensory feedback to stay alert and focused. These and several other "tools" have made a noticeable difference in the level of focus and engagement in my room if used as a "tool" and not a toy. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite useful, have a bit of give, but also have the ability to bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Chell Gladstone

product_meta.title: Impresa Products Spiky Sensory Balls (Pack of 5) - Squeezy and Bouncy Fidget Toys / Sensory Toys - BPA/Phthalate/Latex-Free
product_meta.description: Whether in search of a new fidget toy or tactile / sensory toy, our spiky balls are perfect. Firm but squeezable, they're perfect for sensory and tactile stimulation, as a tactile roll or a sensory brush. They're bouncy, too! Made with 100% high-quality thermoplastic rubber, they are hypoallergenic, nontoxic, and free of BPAs, phthalates and latex. Our spiky balls are strong, durable and safe for kids and adults alike. Dishwasher safe. Perfect for the classroom, home or office, they're great for parents, teachers, students, therapists and anyone else (even people just looking for fun desk toys). A great alternative to other sensory toys, including sensory brushes, rolls and sticks. Each unit is 2.5" in diameter. 5-pack as shown. Fidget and sensory toys are great for all children ages 3+ and adults, but especially those with special needs requiring ADD toys, ADHD toys / ADHD fidget toys, OCD toys, autism fidget toys, or fidget toys for anxiety. These toys help promote a sense of calm, reduce stress / anxiety and can increase focus / attention. Great addition to a collection of sensory fidgets / fidget toys, including squishy stress relief balls, tangle toys, rings, chewable jewelry, necklaces, twiddle toys, pencil toppers, spiky bracelets, fidget cubes, hourglass fidgets, liquid motion bubblers, squeeze toys, rainbow fidget balls, fidget rings, marble fidgets, vibration reminder wristbands, spiky rings, etc.
feature_bullets: Whether in search of a new fidget toy or tactile / sensory toy, our spiky balls are perfect. Firm but squeezable, they're perfect for sensory and tactile stimulation, as a tactile roll or a sensory brush. They also bounce!

Made with 100% high-quality thermoplastic rubber, they are hypoallergenic, nontoxic, and free of BPAs, phthalates and latex. Our spiky balls are strong, durable and safe for kids and adults alike. Dishwasher safe
